name: about
contents:
Hi there!

My name is Aner, and I am what they call a Full-Stack software developer hailing from a quiet little kibbutz in Israel. I have experience ranging from low-level systems and automated solutions, to web applications and mobile apps!


If you're here, you must have taken some interest in me. Go ahead and explore this site, and let me know what you think about this little corner of the web!

name: contact
contents: Here are some ways to contact me:
You can also mail me directly by clicking the icon at the top right of the page!
